name: Exfiltration Over Alternative Protocol - SMTP
description:
Exfiltration of specified file over SMTP.
Upon successful execution, powershell will send an email with attached file to exfiltrate to a remote address. Results will be via stdout.

input_arguments.name: sender
input_arguments.description: The email address of the sender

input_arguments.name: receiver
input_arguments.description: The email address of the receiver

input_arguments.name: smtp_server
input_arguments.description: SMTP server to use for email transportation
